content:
!!!
...If Sani says so, she must have her reasons.
info: 第二次捐赠-捕虫教学（废弃）_主流程文本2

content: I mean, the World Bubble maps and new Astralink guides made by the Migration Association and Revelare Academia didn't mention the tides being THIS intense!
info: 第二次捐赠-捕虫教学（废弃）_主流程文本2

content:
Hoho...
Things are going smoothly.
How's Sani doing?
info: 第二次捐赠-捕虫教学（废弃）_主流程文本2
第二次捐赠-捕虫教学（废弃）_主流程文本2

content:
Hoho ho, perhaps...
Somewhere beyond our sight,
They're living... free and easy.
info: 第二次捐赠-捕虫教学（废弃）_主流程文本2

content:
An insect net can be used to catch insects,
they're an essential part of our ecosystem,
I think it might bring some new fun.
info: 第二次捐赠-捕虫教学（废弃）_主流程文本2

content:
Hohoho, that's good...
Where are they?
info: 第二次捐赠-捕虫教学（废弃）_主流程文本2

content: <size=30>Everything's flooded and you call that just a bit? Nothing's spared at all!</size>
info: 第二次捐赠-捕虫教学（废弃）_主流程文本2

content: Where did those sea fish swim off to?
info: 第二次捐赠-捕虫教学（废弃）_主流程文本2

content:
For the next steps, I'll have to trouble you again Sani, to continue investigating the cause of these tides.
Let's solve this problem as soon as we can,
and restore the normal ecological environment.
info: 第二次捐赠-捕虫教学（废弃）_主流程文本2

content: Whether you catch a new species of fish or insect, you can always bring it to me for a look, hoho...
info: 第二次捐赠-捕虫教学（废弃）_主流程文本2

content: All washed away by the tide!
info: 第二次捐赠-捕虫教学（废弃）_主流程文本2

content:
While it won't affect your fishing,
I'd still like to give you this <color=#8AAB4B>Wooden-Handle Insect Net DIY Card</color>.
Please accept it.
info: 第二次捐赠-捕虫教学（废弃）_主流程文本2

content:
Leave it to me, it'll be a breeze!
All these areas marked on the map,
We haven't missed a single spot!
info: 第二次捐赠-捕虫教学（废弃）_主流程文本2

content:
<color=#d3b037>{me}</color>, here to deliver some creatures?
I saw you casting your line earlier,
looks like you're making great progress!
info: 第二次捐赠-捕虫教学（废弃）_主流程文本2

content:
But with the tides flooding the rivers on land,
won't that affect <color=#d3b037>{me}</color>'s fishing?
info: 第二次捐赠-捕虫教学（废弃）_主流程文本2

content:
I feel a bit embarrassed...
I asked <color=#d3b037>{me}</color> to help collect creatures
and try fishing, but this issue came up.
info: 第二次捐赠-捕虫教学（废弃）_主流程文本2

content:
Come to think of it,
<color=#d3b037>{me}</color> probably
won't be catching any sea fish...
